trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around April 30th 1991
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife was attempting to get film of deer across the street around dusk. I am now putting the vhs tapes on DVD and saw this object while i was recording to DVD.The object is between 2 houses across the street and is visable for about 15 seconds and then my wife locates the deer and then pans up briefly to see that the object is gone.again she did not see this when filming.it is a clear cloudless day and the object is huvering and moves slighly backwards and up and down. i am not able to send the video email but would like to send it by mail on a DVD and have someone look at it to see if it is anything of interest to you as it is for me and my friends and family.
Summary: I have film of object in sky.did not see it until watched vhs tape.
